job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pElectronic Arts Inc is a global interactive entertainment software company EA delivers games content and online services for Internetconnected consoles personal computers mobile phones and tabletsppbrppOur Worldwide Customer Experience WWCE team exists to help the world play We support players across the globe in 13 languages and value employees that will bring new ideas to help make WWCE a great place to be and be from We celebrate diversity and inclusion and aim to create great experiences for our employees as often as our playersppbrppAnd we want you to join us Were hiring a Software Engineer Sr Prototyper You will be part of the Innovation Labs within the EAs Customer Experience organization The Customer Experience organization strives to make EA known for taking care of its playersppbrppYou will explore new technologies and develop proofofconcept demonstrations You have a firm grasp of programming concepts and are comfortable with multiple programming languages and learning new ones You will report to the Sr Manager WWCE Innovation Labs within Customer Experience organizations Insights teamppbrppuYou Will Spend Most Of Your TimeupulliWork with
